Class PlainDeserializer

java.lang.Object
  com.lonepulse.robozombie.response.AbstractDeserializer<CharSequence>
      com.lonepulse.robozombie.response.PlainDeserializer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Deserializer<CharSequence>
public class PlainDeserializer
extends AbstractDeserializer<CharSequence>

This AbstractDeserializer extracts the response data as a raw String.

Since:
1.3.0

Version:
1.1.0

Author:
Lahiru Sahan Jayasinghe

Method Detail

deserialize

public CharSequence deserialize(InvocationContext context,
                                org.apache.http.HttpResponse response)

Deserializes the response content to a type which is assignable to CharSequence.

Specified by:

Parameters:
